title: "Real Estate Billionaires"

        code-fold: true
editor: visual
execute: 
  echo: false
  warning: false
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
```

```{r}
data_raw <- googlesheets4::read_sheet('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ICjbS8SRTXU4VpcypX9Owot3RtCkByDu3sNh0n8Q6-o/edit#gid=0')
data_raw
```

```{r}

data_raw |> 
    group_by(Gender) |> 
    summarise(Count = n()) |> 
    arrange(Count |> desc()) |> 
    ggplot2::ggplot(aes(y= Gender, x = Count, fill = Gender)) +
    geom_col() +
    scale_fill_brewer(
        type = "qual",
        palette = 2,
        direction = 1,
        aesthetics = "fill"
        ) +
    theme_minimal()
```
